inclusion.criterion: Hospital Tengku Ampuan Rahimah Klang and University Malaya Medical centre (UMMC) who require nasoendoscopy, will be invited to take part in this prospective study over 6 months.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Informed consent will be taken detailing the procedure, study conducted and risks involved while participating in the study.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Baseline BP, Age, Gender, Race will be recorded.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Pre procedure anterior Rhinomanometry reading for NIF (Nasal inspiratory flow), Flow Sum, Flow INC will be recorded.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Rhinomanometry readings of both nostrils (Right - tested, Left - Control) will be recorded 5 minutes post procedure.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Pain VAS score 30 minutes' post procedure will be recorded.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: BP and PR repeated at 5,10,15 and 30 minutes' post procedure will be recorded.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Rigid Endoscopic examination and VAS based on degree of decongestion and ease of endoscopic passage will be recorded.
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Patients with underlying systemic medical problems, e.g. Bronchial Asthma, Chronic lung disease, Diabetes, Chronic Kidney disorder, Cerebrovascular accidents (CVA), SLE.
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Patients who have nasal pathologies such as nasal polyps, inverted papillomas, malignancies, deviated nasal septums, septal perforations, deformed external nose, cleft palates.
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Patients with a history of nasal surgery.
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Patients with a history of intranasal topical medications (E.g Intranasal oxymetazoline).
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: The patient is a 34-year-old obese woman who comes to the clinic with weight concerns. She has sleep apnea, PCO and dissatisfaction with her body shape.
